result.execSummary:
The defendant Richard Alan Potenberg was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Sex Offender - Fail/Update Information [Modifiers: Repeater], a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 301.45(4)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

filed by Atty Burdon
and Notice of Right to Seek Post Conviction Relief filed by defendant/counsel

Defendant Richard Alan Potenberg in court, in custody with attorney Amanda K. Riek.  Clifford Burdon appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Waiver of Right to Prelim filed, Court accepts Waiver, probable cause found, bound over, Information filed, waives reading, Rights/Elements, Defendant pleads no contest to Ct. 1, Judgment to be entered, Court sentences defendant to: 2 years prison, 1 year initial confinement, 1 year extended supervision, concurrent to any other sentence, $518.00 costs, 113 days sentence credit, defendant to submit DNA Sample, Defendant is not eligible for Challenge Incarceration or Substances Abuse Program
with Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus for Dodge Correctional Institution on 8/4/16 at 9:00 A.M.
Filed by Atty Amanda Riek, requesting a reset of 8-4-16 return date, due to a scheduling conflict.
with Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus to Dodge Correctional Instit. August 4, 2016 at 9:00 am.

Defendant Richard Alan Potenberg in court, in custody with attorney Amanda K. Riek.  Crystal N Long appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Preliminary hearing requested by attorney Riek.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for August 4, 2016 at 09:00 am.
with Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus for July 19, 2016 at 2:45
Return on 07-19-2016 at 2:45 pm
